title: Defense spending breakdown of the United Kingdom ( UK ) 2017/18 - 2018/19
summary: This grouped bar chart represents 5 different Defense Categorys on X-axis for 2 groups 2017/18, and 2018/19. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Expenditure in billion GBP.
For Defense Category Military defense, 2018/19 had the highest Expenditure in billion GBP 37980.0 among the 2 groups and in Civil defense, 2018/19 had the lowest Expenditure in billion GBP 44.0.
There is a gap of 37936.0 between the highest and lowest Expenditure in billion GBP found for 2018/19 in Defense Category Military defense and Civil defense.

On average, the Defense Category Military defense had the highest Expenditure in billion GBP for all 2 groups 2017/18, and 2018/19. Whereas Civil defense had the lowest average Expenditure in billion GBP.
min_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 5 different Defense Categorys on X-axis for 2 groups 2017/18, and 2018/19. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Expenditure in billion GBP.
For Defense Category Military defense, 2018/19 had the highest Expenditure in billion GBP 37980.0 among the 2 groups and in Civil defense, 2018/19 had the lowest Expenditure in billion GBP 44.0.
mid_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 5 different Defense Categorys on X-axis for 2 groups 2017/18, and 2018/19. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Expenditure in billion GBP.
For Defense Category Military defense, 2018/19 had the highest Expenditure in billion GBP 37980.0 among the 2 groups and in Civil defense, 2018/19 had the lowest Expenditure in billion GBP 44.0.
There is a gap of 37936.0 between the highest and lowest Expenditure in billion GBP found for 2018/19 in Defense Category Military defense and Civil defense.

max_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 5 different Defense Categorys on X-axis for 2 groups 2017/18, and 2018/19. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Expenditure in billion GBP.

Defense Category Military defense had the maximum Expenditure in billion GBP among all 2 groups, and it was for 2018/19. The minimum Expenditure in billion GBP was observed in Defense Category Civil defense for 2018/19.
For Defense Category Military defense, 2018/19 had the maximum Expenditure in billion GBP and it saw the lowest in Defense Category Civil defense out of all 5 Defense Categorys.
There is a gap of 37936.0 between the highest and lowest Expenditure in billion GBP found for 2018/19 in Defense Category Military defense and Civil defense.
Among all 2 groups, 2017/18 had the gap of 36269.0 between the maximum and minimum Expenditure in billion GBP observed in Defense Category Military defense and Civil defense respectively.
Averaging all 2 groups 2017/18, and 2018/19, the Defense Category Military defense is the maximum Expenditure in billion GBP and Civil defense is the minimum Expenditure in billion GBP.
